name: Minor Creation
description: You create a number of simple objects. Each object cannot have more than 2 Presence.

name: Reconstruct
description: An entity of your choice whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value begins to reassemble from the parts nearby. If there are some parts missing, you can substitute a similar amount of raw material to recreate a simple part. Once the spell is cast, the reconstruction takes a 1 minute per point of Presence.

name: Create Intensity
description: You create intensities of Heat, Cold, Electricity, or Light.

name: Regeneration
description: An entity of your choice gains a natural Final Regeneration Value. If the target's Regeneration is greater, than the spell has no effect.

name: Basic Modification
description: An object of your choice whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value changes. The new form's Presence must be no greater than its original Presence.

name: Increase Resistance
description: An entity of your choice gains a power bonus to their Phr, IR, SR, and MR.

name: Royal Shield
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. This barrier possess the Imbued trait.

name: Heal
description: An entity of your choice recovers Life Points and reduces its degrees of Pain. This spell cannot restore damaged limbs. eliminate Pain.

name: Negate Damage
description: An entity of your choice gains a Base Damage Negate against the Physical Damage Group. This BDN can be overcome with the Imbued trait.

name: Create Homunculus
description: You create monad creatures. The creature's level is 0 and must follow the rules for monad creatures. Each homunculus created can have different profiles. The creature is created with the following rules:

items: The creatures are mana elementals with Nornir 5.
No Characteristic or Skill can have a Final Value greater than 5.
The creature's size is reduced by 2 and it cannot choose the Uncommon Size feature.
No Intellectual or Creative Skill's Final Value can be greater than your Final Value.

description: No matter how many creatures this spell creates, they count as a single creature for the purpose of determining the maximum level of other monad creatures.

name: Minor Change
description: You make an Offensive Roll against an entity. On a hit, a target must make a SR Check; a target can choose to fail.

A target that fails the Resistance Check has its appearance changed. A target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of minutes have passed equal to their Degree of Failure on the previous Check.

The change is limited to superficial appearances. For example, you could cause a boulder to appear to be covered in moss. A living target can have its size modified by 2 points but anything it is wearing does not change with it, since they are not targeted.

name: Imitate
description: An object you are in contact with and whose total Presence is no greater than the listed value is duplicated. The duplicate of the target retains all the qualities of the original, including supernatural ones. The duplicate object has the same Presence as the original.

name: Immunity
description: Choose a single entity to target and one elemental intensity. The target gains the listed intensity immunity to the choosen elemental.

name: Reduce Damage
description: You can cast this spell when an attack is declared but before any dice are rolled. You reduce the Base Damage of the triggering attack.

name: Physical Control
description: You gain physical control over a creature. Choose a single creature to target. The target must succeed a SR Check or have its physical actions controlled by you. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of hours have passed equal to their Degree of Failure.

name: Raise Skill
description: Choose a single entity to target. The target gains the listed number of points that they can distribute to any trained Secondary Skill as a power bonus.

name: Fuse
description: Choose two entities to target whose total Presence is no greater than the listed Presence and who are within 5 feet of each other. The targets must succeed a SR Check or be fused into a single new entity. A creature can willingly accept the effects of this spell.

description.name: Case: two creatures
entries: This new creature possess the abilities and features of both targets. You can designate which Base Values, innate bonuses, natural bonuses, and other abilities come from which target. For example, if you fuse a martial artist and a manifester, you can give the new creature the physical Characteristics of the martial artitist and the mental Characteristics of the mentalist. The new creature can fight unarmed and use phenom with ease.

Control of the resulting creature is determined by an Opposed Willpower Check between the targets. The Opposed Willpower Check can be repeated on the End Phase after a number of hours have passed equal to the Degree of Difference. If the DoD is less than 10, then the personality of the loser will influence the actions of the new creature.

description.name: Case: one creature and one object
entries: The Game Master can grant the new creature features related to the fused object.

description.name: Case: two objects
entries: You can the Game Master can determine what the new object will be able to do, based on the original objects.

description: When the spell ends, the targets return to the state they were in before the spell. The death of the new creature, or the breaking of the new object, causes both targets to die.

name: Create Memories
description: You can implant memories into a creature. Choose a single creature to target. The target must succeed a SR or MR Check or you creature memories that they accept as real. The memories to plant must be determined before the Resistance Check is made. The target can repeat the Resistance Check whenever they are given a reason to doubt the planted memories.
Memories that are go against the nature of the creature have their Resistance Check difficulty reduced by 6 points.

name: Recover
description: Choose a single creature to target. The target regains the listed number of Life Points. This spell removes all degrees of Pain caused by natural means.

name: Aquire Power
description: Choose a single entity to target. The target can temporarily gain creature features whose total XP cost is no greater than the listed amount. The target can buy features as a Nornir 25 creature and their phsyical shape will change as approriat. For example, if the target gains a natural Flight Value, they would sprout wings.

name: Create Creature
description: You create a creature out of thin air. The creature's maximum level is listed and follows the rules for creatures created by powers. Additionally, the following rules apply:

items: The creature is a monad with Nornir 20.
The creature can never be given a soul.

name: Protective Aura
description: All entities you choose within the area gain a power bonus to all PhR, IR, SR, and MR Checks. You must be aware of an entity to grant the bonus.

name: Spiritual Standstill
description: Choose a single entity to target. The target must succeed a SR Check or become spiritually immutable. The target can repeat the Resistance Check on the End Phase after a number of rounds have passed equal to their Degree of Failure.
Any mental state affecting the target at the time of casting will not change. The target ignores any further mental state changes. The nature of the target cannot be changed either.

name: Perfect Shield
description: You create a supernatural barrier with the listed Life Points. If the barrier is not broken, it regains all its Life Points at the start of the End Phase.
Unlike most defensive powers, this spell is cast as an Active Action.

name: Vitality
description: Choose a single entity to target. The target gains a power bonus to their maximum Life Points. When the spell ends, the targets current and maximum amount are reduced by the amount gained.
A target with the Rex Damage Role mutliplies the bonus by their Rex Multiplier.

name: Complete Creation
description: You create object whose total Presence is no greater than the listed Presence or twice your Presence. The object must appear in a location that is logical for it, according to its nature. For example, you could not create a boulder in mid air, but a cloud could appear in the sky.

name: Reinforce Magic
description: You can cast this spell when you cast another spell. The triggering spell has the following benefits:

items: Any SR Check increases the difficulty by 2
Any Base Damage is increased by 50%
Supernatural barrier's increase Life Points by 50%
All other numbers increase by 20%, round down, except for Nornir.

description: You must pay the maintaince of the triggering spell and this spell. If either spell ends, they both end.

name: Transmute
description: Choose a single non-living object whose total Presence is no greater than the listed Presence. You convert the object into a completely different one with a similar Presence. If the target is supernatural, it can make a SR Check to resist the change.

name: Metamorphism
description: Choose a single entity to target and a new form for the entity to take. The target must succeed a SR Check or be transformed into the new form. The new forms Presence can be no greater than the target's Presence.
If the new form is a creature, the Game Master can grant certain features of a natural creature of Nornir 0. If the new form is an object, a creature remains alive.

name: Recreate
description: Choose a number of entities whose total Presence is no greater than the listed Presence. You restore any damage or loss that target has, creatures regain all Life Points and objects are made whole. You can choose what to recreate, for example you could fix a missing arm but leave a broken leg. This spell also eliminates any lingering physical or spiritual effects.

This spell does have some limitations. First it cannot restore a spirit to its body or recreate a lost body. Second, this spell only recreates something to its natural state. This cannot recreate something that never existed or something caused by aging.
If the entity was damaged by a creature whose Nornir is 15 points higher than yours, the spell has no effect on the target.

name: Create Being
description: You create a creature out of thin air. The creature's maximum level is listed and follows the rules for creatures created by powers. Additionally, the following rules apply:

items: The creature is a monad with Nornir 20.

name: Chimera
description: Choose a single natural type creature to target. The target ceases being a natural being and becomes a Beyond the Veil creature with a Nornir of 25. Your level increases by the listed amount and you can choose a number of negative features granting you additional XP. All features gained as a result of this spell are dependant on the target's body. If the target ever loses their body, either by their spirit migrating or resurrection, all the effects of the spell end.

effect: Up to 10 XP of negative features
Up to 20 XP of negative features
Up to 30 XP of negative features
Up to 40 XP of negative features

name: Zone of Safety
description: You create an area where no entity can be harmed in any way by another entity. For example, a creature within the zone could not break down a door or step on a spider. Similarly, a projectile fired into the area would be unable to harm a creature inside the area. The exception to this is a creature can continue to cook and consume food that is already harvested or prepared.

Any target can try to overcome the affect by making a SR Check. On a success, the target can act normally. The Resistance Check can be repeated on the End Phase after one day has passed. Even if the target leaves the area and reenters, the effect will persist. Additionally, the target can make a new Resistance Check whenever they take damage -- in this case the target also gains a `+2` deed bonus to the Resistance Check.
This spell cannot select targets, even if another power would allow you to; everyone in the area is equally affected.

name: Maintain Magic
description: Choose a single spell that you or a another creature are maintaining. The target spell gains a special Mana Pool that it will pull from to maintain itself.
You can cast this spell multiple times per spell, giving it even more mana.

name: Provide Soul
description: You create a soul. You can place that soul within an entity whose Presence is no greater than the listed Presence. When a creature created from a power, such as Create Being, gains a soul, it severs all ties with their caster. The creature is no longer controlled by its caster and does not need to be maintained any more.

Not all souls created by this spell are capable of entering a body. Each soul created has a one percent chance to be rejected or is automatically rejected if the body possess too much Presence. In this case, the soul lingers one minute before moving onto the Veil.

name: Greater Creation
description: You gain a pool of Presence Points that you can use to create objects as an Active Action. Any object you create cannot have a Presence greater than the listed maximum Presence. Once the pool of Presence Points is used up, you cannot create anything else.

name: Eternal Magic
description: Choose a single spell that you or a another creature are maintaining. If the targeted spell has a daily maintenance, it no longer requires any maintenance. If the spell has a per turn maintenance, it instead becomes daily.

name: Separate Worlds
description: You create a breach in reality that is capable of separating the world into two parts. This separation cannot be perceived naturally, all visual planes are unable to sense the change. The wall itself can be made to have any appearance, from being invisible to being a large stone wall. Any attempt to see through the wall fails, no matter what power is used.

Any attempt to move through the wall causes the creature to reappear at another point on the wall. This transport is not automatic, instead it occurs little by little as reality changes to steer you away. This failed navigation can be detected with a Zen (44) Notice Check.

You can choose to lease passages, either two or one way and can require certain conditions to be meet. Alternatively, a Nornir 25 creature who is aware of the separated worlds and is navigating can make an SR Check to get through. A success also allows the creature to lead others through if they travel as a group. A creature who has failed can repeat the Resistance Check after a day has passed. A creature that has passed loses the ability to travel through the wall once they leave its border.
The maximum volume that can be separated is listed.

name: The Gift of Life
description: You create a new form of life. The life forms's maximum level is listed and follows the rules for creatures created by powers. Additionally, the following rules apply:

items: The creature is either a natural, spiritual or Beyond the Veil creature.
The creature's Nornir can be any value you choose, but can be no greater than ten points below your Nornir.

description: You can choose wether the new creature will be one that is part of the Veil. If you do, it becomes a true part of the world and it will start to appear in an a natural habitat for it, can be summoned, or might even appear as part of the next Veil -- depending on the creature type.
When the spell ends, all life forms disappear even those that were born naturally. The souls of these creatures do not return to the Veil, and instead disappear completely.

name: Create
description: You gain absolute control over creation. You gain a pool of Presence Points that you can use to create anything; continents, oceans, and entire worlds can be created by your hand. Any entity you create cannot have a Presence greater than the listed maximum Presence. Additionally, you can impose new rules upon reality. For example, you can change the fundamental law of gravity or the passage of time. Any creature with a Nornir of less than half your Nornir is affected by the new reality.
The Presence you can create with allows you to create new worlds even
